pullrequest.title: Disable warnings 4251 and 4275 in Visual Studio

content.raw: @{5bee878f5416561374c46bd9} I have a few MSVC-related  patches that I plan to submit. I personally have no interest in porting them to `gazebo9`, but if you think it could be useful to bring any of those changes to `gazebo9` or `gazebo10`, feel free to let me know so I can target those branches \(as I guess that forward merge is easier then backport\).
content.html: @Sean Yen I have a few MSVC-related patches that I plan to submit. I personally have no interest in porting them to gazebo9, but if you think it could be useful to bring any of those changes to gazebo9 or gazebo10, feel free to let me know so I can target those branches (as I guess that forward merge is easier then backport).
